snippet: Representative Carolyn B. Maloney of New York and advocacy groups respond to a Sunday Review article.
abstract: Letter from Rep Carolyn B Maloney comments on the September 23 Noy Thrupkaew Op-Ed article on the dangers of the campaign to end the demand for prostitution.
lead_paragraph: Representative Carolyn B. Maloney of New York and advocacy groups respond to a Sunday Review article.

headline.main: Ending the Demand Side of Prostitution
headline.print_headline: Ending the Demand Side of Prostitution
